title: Remove redundant straight-line nodes
description: Removes near-colinear on-curve nodes that sit on straight line segments on all masters for selected glyphs (safe cleanup).
code:
from path_utils import remove_redundant_line_nodes
angle_thresh_deg = 2.0
dist_thresh = 2.0
removed = 0
for sl in font.selectedLayers:
    g = sl.parent
    for m in font.masters:
        layer = g.layers[m.id]
        removed += remove_redundant_line_nodes(layer, None, angle_thresh_deg, dist_thresh)
print(f'Removed {removed} redundant nodes in total')
